title: book_Design_Like_You_Give_a_Damn
text:
ISBN-13: 9781933045252.
ISBN-10: 1933045256.
Title: Design Like You Give a Damn.
Subtitle: Architectural Responses to Humanitarian Crises.
Authors: Architecture for Humanity (Organization).
Categories: Architecture.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=jIJuQgAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Citing a harrowing lack of adequate shelter and utilities for nearly half the planet's population, a compendium of innovative architectural projects from around the world features more than 80 ideas designed to address specific urgent needs in desperately underprivileged areas..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.11.

Ratings Count: 770.
